reviewText:
I am so happy with thise purchase, ALL Dino Dan, not all the advertisements that you see with most DVDs.
Love it!!!

My 2 year old grandson LOVES dinosaurs and Dino Dan. He really prefers the first Dino Dan DVD more than this one. There is one episode here done in a film noir style (black & white) that he hates and starts yelling, no no, when it comes on the screen. The remaining episodes are ok. My big problem with both of these DVDs is that they're very short. This entire DVD is only 60 minutes. But, if you have a child who loves dinosaurs, it's fine for only $10.

This is an excellent product and received swiftly and in perfect condition. My son who loves dinosaurs and Dino Dan was extremely pleased to receive this as a birthday present and has been watching this DVD a lot since he received it - a great purchase!

Dan Loves dinosaurs. He can see them everywhere. He and his friends learn by watching them interact with each other. The adults in this series are quite corny. Anyone how loves dinos will enjoy this. Mom, and Dad can even stand it.

RUN TIME 60 MINUTES.... stories >> 1/ DINO RACE .... 2/ READY, SET, DINO ..... 3/  DINO DANCE .... 4/ THE DINO DID IT ....5/ AIR DINO.... I wish AMAZON would include RUN TIME and a list of episodes in their description of their KID DVDs.
He loves this!  Great for our long camping trips and no need to record on DVR and keep changing every 30 minutes :-)

iv'e brought quite a few dino  dans  dvds from here, kids love them and they are educational  and non violent .im strict on what my kids watch on tv and at the movies  kids are exposed to to much violence through  the media etc ,even some cartoons are violent , and my kids arn.t allowed to watch  them but I recommend these DVDS.
A well narrated and attention keeping video.  We used it on a long trip and it was great for keeping them entertained

My grandson loves the Dino Dan DVD's not only are they entertaining but very informatiive.  His knowledge around dinosaurs as been expended from watching them.  Great way to introduce this subject to elementary school children.

My 2.5 year old is obsessed with Dino Dan. I think the episodes are somewhat boring though especially the B&W one (which he doesn't like and like another poster said, he starts screaming "no, no, no" when it comes on!!

Overall, a great buy - especially when your little one wants to watch an hour worth of Dino Dan!
My  4 year old Grandson loved it!  It made a good babysitter on Dec 26th while mom went shopping. .

My grandson loves Dinosaurs. Almost everything he got was Dinos.
I can't wait til we sit and watch this movie cause Dino Dan is his favorite

Bought is as a gift for my 3 year old grandson and he adores it! It is funny, educational and family friendly. With this purchse I also bought other Dino Dan DVD's like Where are the Dinousaurs and Dino Trackers.  All of them I recommend.
My kids love Dino Dan. It is not always on tv and the dvr box is always filling up. Now they can watch it whenever they please. I am happy with this dvd.
Children love Dino Dan
My 5year old Loves the Movie.
Dino Dan is always a good choice for a 5 yr old Dino Lover!
Kids love it
This is a great movie that goes of different dinosaurs. This keeps my 1 yr old entertained.
My grandson loves Dino Dan and he learned as much as he enjoyed,
AWESOME !
I loved it
kids love the dvd
Great movie
